name: Door Mystery
description:
Advance to the next floor by solving the puzzle!
This game is to break out of the rooms.Solve the hidden mysteries doors to open the door and escape from the room.
How to play
- Collect items and tap on the screen.
- Try to open the door to solve the puzzle.

Feature
- Features escape games which are perfect for free time.
- All stages selectable.
- Auto-save.

Addicting puzzles!
Complete utilization of your devices features....
Different themed floors!
Constant updates of New Floors......
